item.title: Fish, Waves and Ocean
item.description: ~Think of your mind like a pond full of fish and each fish is a feeling. Try to be the pond, not the fish.~ This is a tweet I saw a few days ago. It sticks with me since then. Life is nothing but time given to us, short or long. For all of us a day is long and a decade is short. We use our days to trade for years.
